content: Is anybody else working on React components? We were thrilled to find Material UI, Highcharts, D3, and the Cornerstone DICOM viewer had all been ported to React; and are busy making new components for each of the FHIR resources. We'll be publishing a reference framework app early next month (similar to WrapBootstrap); and would be happy to include any React components that people have open sourced or found along the way.
not I @Abigail Watson - I dabble with angular n node
